work.title: Senior Frontend Developer
work.description: Lead frontend development for enterprise web applications serving 100K+ users. Architected and implemented scalable React applications with Next.js, resulting in 40% improvement in page load times.
achievements: Led migration from legacy jQuery codebase to modern React/Next.js stack
Implemented comprehensive design system reducing development time by 30%
Mentored 3 junior developers and established frontend best practices
Optimized application performance achieving 95+ Lighthouse scores

work.title: Full Stack Developer
work.description: Developed and maintained full-stack web applications for early-stage startup. Built features from concept to deployment, working closely with product and design teams.
achievements: Built MVP from scratch serving 10K+ users within 6 months
Implemented real-time features using WebSockets and Redis
Designed and developed RESTful APIs with comprehensive documentation
Set up CI/CD pipelines reducing deployment time by 60%

work.title: Frontend Developer
work.description: Developed responsive websites and web applications for diverse clients including e-commerce, healthcare, and finance sectors.
achievements: Delivered 15+ client projects on time and within budget
Improved client website performance by average of 50%
Collaborated with UX/UI designers to implement pixel-perfect designs
Established responsive design standards and component library

work.title: Junior Web Developer
work.description: Entry-level position focused on frontend development and learning modern web technologies. Contributed to various client projects under senior developer guidance.
achievements: Completed 8+ small to medium-sized website projects
Learned React and modern JavaScript development practices
Implemented responsive designs for mobile-first approach
Participated in code reviews and agile development processes

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.description: Comprehensive computer science program with focus on software engineering, algorithms, and web development.
achievements: Dean's List for 4 consecutive semesters
President of Computer Science Student Association
Winner of Annual Hackathon 2017
Teaching Assistant for Intro to Programming course

education.description: Intensive 6-month program focused on modern web development technologies and best practices.
achievements: Graduated with honors (top 10% of class)
